title: Book Cover, "Industrial Design in america, 1954", 1954
signed: Signature printed vertically at lower left: lustig.
inscribed: Printed vertically in white ink, left margin: Industrial Design in America 1954; printed horizontally in white ink, lower center: Industrial Design in America. Printed vertically in black ink, left margin: Farrar, Straus & Young, Inc.; printed horizontally in black ink, upper right: Contemporary work selected by the Society of Industrial Designers. Printed in colored inks, lower right: 1954.
description: Printed on tan ground the cover for Industrial Design in America, 1954.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Industrial Design in america, 1954", 1954.
1954. Paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-60.
